colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES RANG RANG SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO SOGS PA BKRA SHIS KYI DGE MTSAN SPEL PHYIR BYIN 'BEBS GSOL 'DEBS AE WAm CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS, ^SPRUL SKU DHARM'A BADZRA GYIS GSUNG RGYUN LTAR, SHING MO YOS LO CHOS 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DGAR TSIS GNYIS PAR DBEN GNAS AE WAm DGA' KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
